ComicInfo.Summary: Just Desserts, 5 of 5: Tony goes home for Thanksgiving dinner. John surprizes Tony by crashing the family party and bringing Amelia along. As the family sits down to dinner, they hear a car crash outside. Everyone comes outside to see alien skywriting filling the sky.
